questions.question: Given that: $$ f(x) = 0.23 + 25x - 200x^2 + 675x^3 - 900x^4 + 400x^5 $$. Find the value of $$ \int_0^{0.8} f(x) dx $$ with Richardson Extrapolation.

Given that: $$ f(x) = 0.23 + 25x - 200x^2 + 675x^3 - 900x^4 + 400x^5 $$. In the integration $$ \int_0^{0.8} f(x) dx $$ using Richardson Extrapolation method, what is the percentage error w.r.t to direct solution.
